title: Don’t Look For Me - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Betrayal   Confident Protagonist   European Ambience   Family Conflict   Fantasy Creatures   Fantasy World   Female Protagonist   Handsome Male Lead   Loner Protagonist   Long Separations   Lovers Reunited   Slow Romance
author: 사라진
description:
Euphemia, who escaped from her heartless family and became the caretaker of an old duchess.

When she found out that the servant who had been around her was actually a small duke, Euphemia had already fallen in love with him. 

The heir of the great duke and the troubles of the Korean-American baron.

The ending of an unwelcome love was predictable. 

“My son has done something immature. You should leave the duke’s house.” 

The old lady coldly pushed her away, 

“I was in trouble because your son was so clingy.” 

Euphemia left without hesitation.

With a secret she didn’t even know herself.>
